title: Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics

February 1 2018 CAS stated that the sanctions against 28 Russian athletes, including Ivan Skobrev, were annulled and their individual results achieved in Sochi 2014 reinstated. ** Aleksandr Romyantsev RUS was sanctioned by IOC for an anti-doping rule violation according to IOC Disciplinary Commissions desicion of November 24 2017. February 1 2018 CAS stated that the sanctions against 28 Russian athletes, including Aleksandr Romyantsev, were annulled and their individual results achieved in Sochi 2014 reinstated.","33":null,"34":"Men's 5000 m - Speed Skating - Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics Event Format:  Skaters raced in pairs on separate tracks (the inner and outer lanes) on a 400 m oval rink. Skaters switched lanes at every lap in order to skate an equal distance. The Gold medal winner was the athlete with the fastest time for the race. Event facts: Men's 5000 m competition was held at the Adler Arena and 26 athletes participated in the event.","35":null,"36":"These results for Men's 5000 m - Sochi 2014 Winter Olympics - are based on the official olympic reports and the Olympian Database","37":null},"1":{"0":null,"1":"Men's 5000 m 2014","2":null,"3":"Final","4":null,"5":"Sven Kramer","6":"Jan Blokhuijsen","7":"Jorrit Bergsma","8":"Bart Swings","9":"Sverre Lunde Pedersen","10":"Denis Yuskov","11":"Ivan Skobrev","12":"Patrick Beckert","13":"H\u00e5vard B\u00f8kko","14":"Moritz Geisreiter","15":"Aleksandr Rumyantsev","16":"Lee Seunghoon","17":"Jan Szymanski","18":"Shane Dobbin","19":"Dmitriy Babenko","20":"Emery Lehman","21":"Andrea Giovannini","22":"Ewen Fernandez","23":"Jonathan Kuck","24":"Patrick Meek","25":"Alexei Baumg\u00e4rtner","26":"Mathieu Giroux","27":"Sebastian Druszkiewicz","28":"Kim Cheol-min","29":"Simen Spieler Nilsen","30":"Shane Williamson","31":null,"32":"* Ivan Skobrev RUS was sanctioned by IOC for an anti-doping rule violation according to IOC Disciplinary Commissions desicion of December 22 2017.
